ClipCard

Responsive Web, Interface Design

Initial Explorations/Project Goals

  • Existing UX doesn't reflect some more recent updates in the software the team is building.
  • Make combined searching feel clearer and appeal simpler than it is
  • Hide the complexity of multiple data sources happening behind the scenes.
  • Users just want to find the thing they're looking for, and not have to remember which email or cloud storage or git repo something was on.
  • Show users just enough info about the source to help them find the thing they want

Further Refinements

  • Working within a tight budget to make a big impact, Making smart tweaks while not being able to make sweeping changes.
  • Was not around for a lot of the dev implementation phase, but came back for followup feedback meetings, and some followup brainstorm sessions.
